title: Riverside in Historic Renovation!  Exposed Brick and Wood Beams!
posting_body: ['We’re excited to announce the start of pre-leasing for 724 Lofts, a gorgeous historic rehab opening July 2022!', '724 Lofts is a historic building with brand new interiors, exposed brick, functional floor plans, and superior customer service located in the idyllic walkable, bike-able North Loop neighborhood.', 'Your backyard is the Mississippi River National Recreation Area, with miles of trails winding through parkland.', 'Your front yard is the North Loop playground with bars, restaurants, and boutique retail; all just a short walk to world class sports and entertainment venues like the Guthrie Theatre, Twins Stadium, Fillmore, and First Ave!', '#505 - Plan E', 'Unit #505 is a two bedroom, one bath apartment located on the 5th floor with gorgeous river parkway views!', ' This home offers a blend of new and original finishes such as white Carrera Cloud quartz countertops and polished concrete floors with large historic windows, exposed brick and massive wood beams.', ' Features include a full size in-unit washer/dryer, spacious closets, soft touch cabinetry, LED lighting throughout, and a thoughtfully designed layout utilizing the square footage to its maximum.', 'Be among the first to live at 724 Lofts!', 'For info on amenities and to apply: <URL>', 'Prices & Specials subject to change.', '724 Lofts is managed by Solhem Companies: <URL>', 'Minneapolis -- Mpls -- North Loop -- Warehouse District -- NE -- Northeast -- U of M -- Boutique -- Luxury -- Scandinavian -- Mid-Century Modern -- Bike Friendly -- Pet, Dog, Cat Friendly -- Green Living -- Sustainable -- Electric Car Charging -- Historic Rehab']
